subject: Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: Steve Hallam is leaving McLaren Racing in Formula One and moving to Nascar, where he will join Michael Waltrip Racing as the director of race engineering. Hallam has participated in 430 Grand Prix races and won 5 world championships in Formula One. ¶Kyle Busch claimed his eighth victory this season in the Nationwide Series, leading in 157 laps and dominating to win at Dover International Speedway in Delaware. “It was a pretty flawless day for us,” Busch said. “We made it look easy.” busch (AP).
